<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we remove a barrier we need to copy dependencies</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from the predecessor to maintain order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep">SDep</a> &amp;ExportPred : PredSU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#ae2b43854b542de66eec6475adc48f56c">Preds</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;ExportPredSU = ExportPred.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep/#a03a2dc5f9f321a2ce28f5c641dfe5455">getSUnit</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ExportPred.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep/#af5c4f1ea353d427a527f548d6bae4593">isBarrier</a>() &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuexportclustering-cpp-/#a0a4dd89f625a6f7a354c0a5994114d1a">isExport</a>(&#42;ExportPredSU))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">          ToAdd.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep">SDep</a>(ExportPredSU, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep/#a551060cb0333d9d0cfdacd2576d817b9a3d026b42ef4cc00c58dd954b3c5eda65">SDep::Barrier</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;SUnit &#42;, 8&gt;</a> Chain;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Pass through DAG gathering a list of exports and removing barrier edges</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// creating dependencies on exports. Freeing exports of successor edges</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allows more scheduling freedom, and nothing should be order dependent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on exports.  Edges will be added later to order the exports.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PosCount = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &amp;SU : DAG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledag/#a3d5aacd5fc7d6a739ce913974ed1e53d">SUnits</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuexportclustering-cpp-/#a0a4dd89f625a6f7a354c0a5994114d1a">isExport</a>(SU))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Chain.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(&amp;SU);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuexportclustering-cpp-/#a50ac9b7a39c6896200c312ccd78206bc">isPositionExport</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>, &amp;SU))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PosCount++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuexportclustering-cpp-/#ac88025eb8866478014f41b34cd29b593">removeExportDependencies</a>(DAG, SU);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"></CodeLine>
